customer_addr:
2706 County Road E
MOUNT HOREB, WI 53572

citations.narrative:
Some areas of feed/bedding storage were cluttered and had spilled feed/bedding on the floor. Clutter and spilled
feed/bedding material can create areas for pests to reproduce. Ensure that food/bedding storage areas are maintained
clean on a regular basis.
Correct by 7/30/2021

The facility has a pest control program in place, however the outdoor temporary housing for 70 pigs had excessive flies on
the west open pen side. Excessive flies can cause discomfort and spread disease. Ensure that the pest control
program's effectiveness is strengthened for this area.
Correct by 8/2/2021.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
Some areas of feed/bedding  storage were cluttered and had spilled feed/bedding  on the floor.  Clutter and spilled 
feed/bedding  material can create areas for pests to reproduce.  Ensure that food/bedding  storage areas are maintained 
clean on a regular basis. 
 
Correct by 7/30/2021 
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
The facility has a pest control program in place, however  the outdoor temporary housing for 70 pigs had excessive flies on 
the west open pen side.  Excessive flies can cause discomfort and spread disease.  Ensure that the pest control 
program's effectiveness is strengthened for this area. 
 
Correct by 8/2/2021. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.

End Section
